description.value:
A jolt of electricity reaches from you toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target, ignoring any cover bonuses resulting from other creatures obstructing the attack’s path. On a hit, the creature takes 1d10 lightning damage. Hit or miss, the target and any creature standing in a line between you and the target must succeed on a Dexterity (Save) Check or take 2d6 lightning damage as an arc of lightning briefly flickers between you and your target.

Charge: This is a spell that can be Charged, modifying its effects. Costs and effects are as follow:

  • 1 Mana: The spell’s range increases to 30 feet.
  • 1 Mana: The lightning damage on a successful save is increased to half damage.
  • 1 Mana: The attack deals 1d8 additional lightning damage to its target for each creature in the line that fails the save.
  • 3 Mana: The lightning damage on a failed save increases to 4d6.
